column5: Big thanks to Burt and his team at Converta-Boat International...My rig looks super sharp and the quality, service and pricing is 2nd to none...
very nice - do you mind if I ask what kind of material was used and the approx price ?  I'm looking for something similar for my boat (mine's a 1750 fishhawk - yours ?)  thx.
Mines a 1750 Fishhawk as well...  Drop me a email and I will give you some more details...  [emailÂ protected]
